LanguageData.PiercingWeapon.label: Piercing weapon
LanguageData.PiercingWeapon.description: Develop melee weapons with increased penetration in an attempt to neutralize heavily armored opponents.
LanguageData.MechanicalWeapon.label: Mechanical weapon
LanguageData.MechanicalWeapon.description: Craft weapons of increased mechanical complexity.
LanguageData.Ballista.label: Ballista
LanguageData.Ballista.description: Develop a ballista which can be operated even by the smaller body sized Ratkin.
LanguageData.Bigmouse.label: Cannon
LanguageData.Bigmouse.description: Develop a large cannon capable of firing heavy cannonballs to breach fortifications.
LanguageData.Advanced_BallistaBolt.label: Advanced ballista bolt
LanguageData.Advanced_BallistaBolt.description: Develop variations of ballista bolts for specialized purposes.
LanguageData.MicroOptical.label: Micro-optics
LanguageData.MicroOptical.description: Replicate human micro-optics technology for Ratkin use to compensate their poor eyesight. Need Ratkin glasses to research.
LanguageData.FlechetteBullet.label: flechette bullet
LanguageData.FlechetteBullet.description: Develop projectiles with greater penetrative capabilities. Flechettes are heavier and standard bullets but are designed to penetrate armor. Need Ratkin glasses to research.
LanguageData.RatkinClothing.label: Ratkin clothing
LanguageData.RatkinClothing.description: Design comfortable Ratkin clothing for both specialized work roles and day-to-day use.
LanguageData.HighClassClothing.label: high class clothing
LanguageData.HighClassClothing.description: Design Ratkin clothing for combat and high-class luxury. Need Ratkin glasses to research.
